extension.description: This script updates the system, installs pulseaudio and puleaudio-equalizer on the system and changes the OSMC startup script to enable pulseaudio.
Dieses Programm installiert pulseaudio und pulseaudio-equalizer auf dem system und verändert das OSMC Startscript.
extension.news: v1.0.2 - make it work on vero 3/5 v1.0.1 - Disable timer schedule by default and set a default buffer size - Add menu entry to reset pulseaudio settings - Include a static equalizer route with a compressor v1.0.0 - Initial Version
